source: Trump to sign executive order to withdraw from TPP. President Trump is expected to sign an executive order Monday announcing his plan to withdraw from the Trans-Pacific Partnership (TPP) trade deal, according to multiple reports. He will instead start individual trade negotiations with the countries in the partnership.

Trump to pull out of Trans-Pacific Partnership. President Trump is expected to sign executive orders Monday that pulls the U.S. out of the Trans-Pacific Partnership and possible unravel other major trade deals, according to multiple reports.

Trump’s First Monday in Office: Dismantling Trade Agreements. President Trump is expected to take two steps to begin the upending of American trade policy very soon—perhaps as soon as Monday. One, an executive order withdrawing the United States from the Trans-Pacific Partnership, which Barack Obama championed, is expected to be issued Monday.
target: Trump To Withdraw from TPP. President Trump is expected to sign executive orders Monday that pulls the U.S. out of the Trans-Pacific Partnership.  Instead, he will start individual trade negotiations.
